metadata.title: CVE-2020-0347 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In iptables, there is a possible out of bounds write due to an incorrect bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-11Android ID: A-136658008

criterions.comment: iptables package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
